info.description: These APIs provide services for manipulating Harbor project.
info.title: Harbor API

post.description: Upload a chart file to the default 'library' project. Uploading together with the prov file at the same time is also supported.
post.summary: Upload a chart file to the defult 'library' project.

201.description: The specified chart is successfully uploaded.

get.description: Check the health of chart repository service.
get.summary: Check the health of chart repository service.

200.description: Health status of chart repository service is returned.

get.description: Get all the charts under the specified project
get.summary: Get all the charts under the specified project

post.description: Upload a chart file to the specified project. With this API, the corresponding provance file can be uploaded together with chart file at once.
post.summary: Upload a chart file to the specified project.

201.description: The specified chart is successfully uploaded.

get.description: Get all the versions of the specified chart
get.summary: Get all the versions of the specified chart

delete.description: Delete all the versions of the specified chart
delete.summary: Delete all the versions of the specified chart

200.description: The specified chart entry is successfully deleted.

get.description: Get the specified chart version

200.description: The specified chart entry is successfully deleted.

post.description: Upload a provance file to the specified project. The provance file should be targeted for an existing chart file.
post.summary: Upload a provance file to the specified project.

201.description: The provance file is successfully uploaded.

get.description: This endpoint is for retrieving system configurations that only provides for admin user.

200.description: Get system configurations successfully. The response body is a map.

401.description: User need to log in first.ÃŸ

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

put.description: This endpoint is for modifying system configurations that only provides for admin user.

parameters.description: The configuration map can contain a subset of the attributes of the schema, which are to be updated.
parameters.name: configurations

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

post.description: Reset system configurations from environment variables. Can only be accessed by admin user.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

post.description: Test connection and authentication with email server.
post.summary: Test connection and authentication with email server.

parameters.description: Email server settings, if some of the settings are not assigned, they will be read from system configuration.
parameters.name: settings

400.description: Inviald email server settings.

401.description: User need to login first.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

post.description: This endpoint is for syncing all repositories of registry with database.
post.summary: Sync repositories from registry to DB.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

get.description: This endpoint let user list filters jobs according to the policy and repository. (if start_time and end_time are both null, list jobs of last 10 days)
get.summary: List filters jobs according to the policy and repository

parameters.description: The ID of the policy that triggered this job.
parameters.name: policy_id

parameters.description: The end time of jobs done. (Timestamp)
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: The respond jobs list filter by repository name.
parameters.name: repository

parameters.description: The respond jobs list filter by status.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: The size of per page, default is 10, maximum is 100.
parameters.name: page_size

Link.description: Link refers to the previous page and next page

400.description: Bad request because of invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to login first.

put.description: The endpoint is used to stop the replication jobs of a policy.
put.summary: Update status of jobs. Only stop is supported for now.

400.description: Bad request because of invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to login first.

403.description: User has no privilege for the operation.

delete.description: This endpoint is aimed to remove specific ID job from jobservice.

400.description: Job ID is invalid or can't remove this job.

401.description: Only admin has this authority.

get.description: This endpoint let user search job logs filtered by specific ID.

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

401.description: User need to log in first.

404.description: The specific repository ID's log does not exist.

get.description: This endpoint let user get scan job logs filtered by specific ID.

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

401.description: User need to log in first.

404.description: The specific repository ID's log does not exist.

get.description: This endpoint let user list labels by name, scope and project_id
get.summary: List labels according to the query strings.

parameters.description: The label scope. Valid values are g and p. g for global labels and p for project labels.
parameters.name: scope

parameters.description: Relevant project ID, required when scope is p.
parameters.name: project_id

400.description: Invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to log in first.

post.description: This endpoint let user creates a label.

400.description: Invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to log in first.

409.description: Label with the same name and same scope already exists.

get.description: This endpoint let user get the label by specific ID.
get.summary: Get the label specified by ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

put.description: This endpoint let user update label properties.

400.description: Invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to log in first.

409.description: The label with the same name already exists.

delete.description: Delete the label specified by ID.
delete.summary: Delete the label specified by ID.

400.description: Invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: This endpoint let user get the resources that the label is referenced by. Only the replication policies are returned for now.
get.summary: Get the resources that the label is referenced by.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: Forbidden.

get.description: This endpoint searches the available ldap groups based on related configuration parameters. support to search by groupname or groupdn.

400.description: The Ldap group DN is invalid.

post.description: This endpoint ping the available ldap service for test related configuration parameters.

parameters.description: ldap configuration. support input ldap service configuration. If it's a empty request, will load current configuration from the system.
parameters.name: ldapconf

400.description: Inviald ldap configuration parameters.

401.description: User need to login first.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

post.description:
This endpoint adds the selected available ldap users to harbor based on related configuration parameters from the system. System will try to guess the user email address and realname, add to harbor user information. 
If have errors when import user, will return the list of importing failed uid and the failed reason.

parameters.description: The uid listed for importing. This list will check users validity of ldap service based on configuration from the system.
parameters.name: uid_list

401.description: User need to login first.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

get.description: This endpoint searches the available ldap users based on related configuration parameters. Support searched by input ladp configuration, load configuration from the system and specific filter.

401.description: User need to login first.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

get.description: This endpoint let user see the recent operation logs of the projects which he is member of
get.summary: Get recent logs of the projects which the user is a member of

parameters.description: The size of per page, default is 10, maximum is 100.
parameters.name: page_size

400.description: Bad request because of invalid parameters.

401.description: User need to login first.

get.description: This endpoint let user list filters policies by name and project_id, if name and project_id are nil, list returns all policies
get.summary: List filters policies by name and project_id

400.description: Invalid project ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

post.description: This endpoint let user creates a policy, and if it is enabled, the replication will be triggered right now.

400.description: Invalid project ID or target ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

409.description: Policy name already used or policy already exists with the same project and target.

get.description: This endpoint let user search replication policy by specific ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

404.description: The specific repository ID's policy does not exist.

put.description: This endpoint let user update policy name, description, target and enablement.
put.summary: Put modifies name, description, target and enablement of policy.

parameters.description: Updated properties of the replication policy.
parameters.name: policyupdate

400.description: policy is enabled or target does not exist

401.description: User need to log in first.

404.description: The specific repository ID's policy does not exist.

409.description: Policy name already used or policy already exists with the same project and target.

get.description: This endpoint returns all projects created by Harbor, and can be filtered by project name.

parameters.description: The project is public or private.
parameters.name: public

parameters.description: The size of per page, default is 10, maximum is 100.
parameters.name: page_size

Link.description: Link refers to the previous page and next page

401.description: User need to log in first.

post.description: This endpoint is for user to create a new project.

400.description: Unsatisfied with constraints of the project creation.

401.description: User need to log in first.

head.description: This endpoint is used to check if the project name user provided already exist.
head.summary: Check if the project name user provided already exists.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: This endpoint returns specific project information by project ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

put.description: This endpoint is aimed to update the properties of a project.
put.summary: Update properties for a selected project.

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission to the project.

delete.description: This endpoint is aimed to delete project by project ID.

parameters.description: Project ID of project which will be deleted.
parameters.name: project_id

400.description: Invalid project id.

403.description: User need to log in first.

412.description: Project contains policies, can not be deleted.

get.description: This endpoint let user search access logs filtered by operations and date time ranges.
get.summary: Get access logs accompany with a relevant project.

parameters.description: The size of per page, default is 10, maximum is 100.
parameters.name: page_size

Link.description: Link refers to the previous page and next page

X-Total-Count.description: The total count of access logs

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: Get all project member information

400.description: The project id is invalid.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

post.description: Create project member relationship, the member can be one of the user_member and group_member,  The user_member need to specify user_id or username. If the user already exist in harbor DB, specify the user_id,  If does not exist in harbor DB, it will SearchAndOnBoard the user. The group_member need to specify id or ldap_group_dn. If the group already exist in harbor DB. specify the user group's id,  If does not exist, it will SearchAndOnBoard the group.

400.description: Illegal format of project member or project id is invalid, or LDAP DN is invalid.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

404.description: Project does not exist, or the username does not found, or the user group does not found.

409.description: An LDAP user group with same DN already exist.

get.description: Get the project member information

400.description: Illegal format of project member or invalid project id, member id.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

404.description: Project or projet member does not exist.

400.description: Invalid role id, it should be 1,2 or 3, or invalid project id, or invalid member id.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

404.description: project or project member does not exist.

400.description: The project id or project member id is invalid.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

get.description: This endpoint returns metadata of the project specified by project ID.

401.description: User need to login first.

post.description: This endpoint is aimed to add metadata of a project.

400.description: Invalid request.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission to the project.

get.description: This endpoint returns specified metadata of a project.

401.description: User need to log in first.

put.description: This endpoint is aimed to update the metadata of a project.

400.description: Invalid request.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission to the project.

404.description: Project or metadata does not exist.

delete.description: This endpoint is aimed to delete metadata of a project.

400.description: Invalid requst.

403.description: User need to log in first.

404.description: Project or metadata does not exist.

post.description: This endpoint is used to trigger a replication.
post.summary: Trigger the replication according to the specified policy.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: This endpoint lets user search repositories accompanying with relevant project ID and repo name. Repositories can be sorted by repo name, creation_time, update_time in either ascending or descending order.
get.summary: Get repositories accompany with relevant project and repo name.

parameters.description: Sort method, valid values include: 'name', '-name', 'creation_time', '-creation_time', 'update_time', '-update_time'. Here '-' stands for descending order.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: The ID of label used to filter the result.
parameters.name: label_id

parameters.description: The size of per page, default is 10, maximum is 100.
parameters.name: page_size

Link.description: Link refers to the previous page and next page

400.description: Invalid project ID.

403.description: Project is not public or current user is irrelevant to the repository.

post.description: The server will launch different jobs to scan each image on the regsitry, so this is equivalent to calling  the API to scan the image one by one in background, so there's no way to track the overall status of the "scan all" action.  Only system adim has permission to call this API.
post.summary: Scan all images of the registry.

parameters.description: When this parm is set only the images under the project identified by the project_id will be scanned.
parameters.name: project_id

202.description: The action is successully taken in the background.  If some images are failed to scan it will only be reflected in the job status.

401.description: User needs to login or call the API with correct credentials.

403.description: User doesn't have permission to perform the action.

503.description: Harbor is not deployed with Clair.

get.description: This endpoint aims to let users see the most popular public repositories
get.summary: Get public repositories which are accessed most.

parameters.description: The number of the requested public repositories, default is 10 if not provided.
parameters.name: count

400.description: Bad request because of invalid count.

put.description: This endpoint is used to update description of the repository.

parameters.description: The name of repository which will be deleted.
parameters.name: repo_name

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden.

delete.description: This endpoint let user delete a repository with name.

parameters.description: The name of repository which will be deleted.
parameters.name: repo_name

400.description: Invalid repo_name.

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden.

get.description: Get labels of a repository specified by the repo_name.

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden. User should have read permisson for the repository to perform the action.

post.description: Add a label to the repository.
post.summary: Add a label to the repository.

parameters.description: Only the ID property is required.
parameters.name: label

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden. User should have write permisson for the repository to perform the action.

delete.description: Delete the label from the repository specified by the repo_name.

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden. User should have write permisson for the repository to perform the action.

get.description:
This endpoint aims to retrieve signature information of a repository, the data is
from the nested notary instance of Harbor.
If the repository does not have any signature information in notary, this API will
return an empty list with response code 200, instead of 404
get.summary: Get signature information of a repository

get.description: This endpoint aims to retrieve tags from a relevant repository. If deployed with Notary, the signature property of response represents whether the image is singed or not. If the property is null, the image is unsigned.
get.summary: Get tags of a relevant repository.

parameters.description: A list of comma separated label IDs.
parameters.name: label_ids

get.description: This endpoint aims to retrieve the tag of the repository. If deployed with Notary, the signature property of response represents whether the image is singed or not. If the property is null, the image is unsigned.
get.summary: Get the tag of the repository.

delete.description: This endpoint let user delete tags with repo name and tag.
delete.summary: Delete a tag in a repository.

parameters.description: The name of repository which will be deleted.
parameters.name: repo_name

400.description: Invalid repo_name.

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden.

get.description: Get labels of an image specified by the repo_name and tag.

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden. User should have read permisson for the image to perform the action.

post.description: Add a label to the image.

parameters.description: Only the ID property is required.
parameters.name: label

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden. User should have write permisson for the image to perform the action.

delete.description: Delete the label from the image specified by the repo_name and tag.

401.description: Unauthorized.

403.description: Forbidden. User should have write permisson for the image to perform the action.

get.description: This endpoint aims to retreive manifests from a relevant repository.
get.summary: Get manifests of a relevant repository.

parameters.description: The version of manifest, valid value are "v1" and "v2", default is "v2"
parameters.name: version

200.description: Retrieved manifests from a relevant repository successfully.

404.description: Retrieved manifests from a relevant repository not found.

post.description: Trigger jobservice to call Clair API to scan the image identified by the repo_name and tag.  Only project admins have permission to scan images under the project.

200.description: Successfully created the job to scan image.

401.description: User needs to login or call the API with correct credentials.

403.description: User doesn't have permission to perform the action.

404.description: The image does not exist in Harbor.

503.description: Harbor is not deployed with Clair.

get.description: Call Clair API to get the vulnerability based on the previous successful scan.
get.summary: Get vulnerability details of the image.

401.description: User needs to login or call the API with correct credentials.

403.description: User doesn't have permission to perform the action.

404.description: The image does not exist in Harbor.

503.description: Harbor is not deployed with Clair.

get.description: The Search endpoint returns information about the projects ,repositories  and helm charts offered at public status or related to the current logged in user. The response includes the project, repository list and charts in a proper display order.
get.summary: Search for projects, repositories and helm charts

parameters.description: Search parameter for project and repository name.
parameters.name: q

get.description: This endpoint is aimed to statistic all of the projects number and repositories number relevant to the logined user, also the public projects number and repositories number. If the user is admin, he can also get total projects number and total repositories number.
get.summary: Get projects number and repositories number relevant to the user

200.description: Get the projects number and repositories number relevant to the user successfully.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: This endpoint is for user to search registered users, support for filtering results with username.Notice, by now this operation is only for administrator.

200.description: Searched for users of Harbor successfully.

400.description: Invalid user ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

403.description: User registration can only be used by admin role user when self-registration is off.

get.description: This endpoint is to get the current user infomation.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: Get user's profile with user id.

400.description: Invalid user ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

put.description: This endpoint let a registered user change his profile.
put.summary: Update a registered user to change his profile.

parameters.description: Only email, realname and comment can be modified.
parameters.name: profile

400.description: Invalid user ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

delete.description:
This endpoint let administrator of Harbor mark a registered user as
be removed.It actually won't be deleted from DB.
delete.summary: Mark a registered user as be removed.

parameters.description: User ID for marking as to be removed.
parameters.name: user_id

200.description: Marked user as be removed successfully.

400.description: Invalid user ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

put.description: This endpoint is for user to update password. Users with the admin role can change any user's password. Guest users can change only their own password.
put.summary: Change the password on a user that already exists.

parameters.description: Password to be updated, the attribute 'old_password' is optional when the API is called by the system administrator.
parameters.name: password

400.description: Invalid user ID; Old password is blank; New password is blank.

401.description: Don't have authority to change password. Please check login status.

403.description: The caller does not have permission to update the password of the user with given ID, or the old password in request body is not correct.

put.description:
This endpoint let a registered user change to be an administrator
of Harbor.
put.summary: Update a registered user to change to be an administrator of Harbor.

parameters.description: Toggle a user to admin or not.
parameters.name: has_admin_role

400.description: Invalid user ID.

401.description: User need to log in first.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

log_id.description: The ID of the log entry.

op_time.description: The time when this operation is triggered.

operation.description: The operation against the repository in this log entry.

repo_name.description: Name of the repository in this log entry.

repo_tag.description: Tag of the repository in this log entry.

username.description: Username of the user in this log entry.

editable.description: The configure item can be updated or not

value.description: The boolean value of current config item

ChartAPIError.description: The error object returned by chart repository API

error.description: The error message returned by the chart API

ChartInfoEntry.description: The object contains basic chart information

deprecated.description: Flag to indicate if the chart is deprecated

ChartInfoList.description: The chart list under the project

apiVersion.description: The API version of this chart

appVersion.description: The version of the application enclosed in the chart

deprecated.description: Whether or not this chart is deprecated

home.description: The URL to the relevant project page

icon.description: The URL to an icon file

sources.description: The URL to the source code of chart

created.description: The created time of the chart entry

digest.description: The digest value of the chart entry

removed.description: A flag to indicate if the chart entry is removed

urls.description: The urls of the chart entry

ChartVersionDetails.description: The detailed information of the chart entry

count.description: number of the components with certain severity.

auth_mode.description: The auth mode of current system, such as "db_auth", "ldap_auth"

email_from.description: The sender name for Email notification.

email_host.description: The hostname of SMTP server that sends Email notification.

email_identity.description: By default it's empty so the email_username is picked.

email_insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the email server.

email_ssl.description: When it's set to true the system will access Email server via TLS by default.  If it's set to false, it still will handle "STARTTLS" from server side.

email_username.description: The username for authenticate against SMTP server.

ldap_base_dn.description: The Base DN for LDAP binding.

ldap_group_admin_dn.description: Specify the ldap group which have the same privilege with Harbor admin.

ldap_group_attribute_name.description: The attribute which is used as identity of the LDAP group, default is cn.

ldap_group_base_dn.description: The base DN to search LDAP group.

ldap_group_search_filter.description: The filter to search the ldap group.

ldap_search_dn.description: The DN of the user to do the search.

ldap_timeout.description: timeout in seconds for connection to LDAP server.

ldap_uid.description: The attribute which is used as identity for the LDAP binding, such as "CN" or "SAMAccountname"

project_creation_restriction.description: This attribute restricts what users have the permission to create project.  It can be "everyone" or "adminonly".

read_only.description: 'docker push' is prohibited by Harbor if you set it to true.

parameter.description: The parameters of the policy, the values are dependant on the type of the policy.

daily_time.description: The offest in seconds of UTC 0 o'clock, only valid when the policy type is "daily"

type.description: The type of scan all policy, currently the valid values are "none" and "daily"

self_registration.description: Whether the Harbor instance supports self-registration.  If it's set to false, admin need to add user to the instance.

token_expiration.description: The expiration time of the token for internal Registry, in minutes.

verify_remote_cert.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access a remote Harbor instance for replication.

auth_mode.description: The auth mode of current system, such as "db_auth", "ldap_auth"

email_from.description: The sender name for Email notification.

email_host.description: The hostname of SMTP server that sends Email notification.

email_identity.description: By default it's empty so the email_username is picked.

email_insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the email server.

email_ssl.description: When it's set to true the system will access Email server via TLS by default.  If it's set to false, it still will handle "STARTTLS" from server side.

email_username.description: The username for authenticate against SMTP server.

ldap_base_dn.description: The Base DN for LDAP binding.

ldap_group_admin_dn.description: Specify the ldap group which have the same privilege with Harbor admin.

ldap_group_attribute_name.description: The attribute which is used as identity of the LDAP group, default is cn.

ldap_group_base_dn.description: The base DN to search LDAP group.

ldap_group_search_filter.description: The filter to search the ldap group.

ldap_search_dn.description: The DN of the user to do the search.

ldap_timeout.description: timeout in seconds for connection to LDAP server.

ldap_uid.description: The attribute which is used as identity for the LDAP binding, such as "CN" or "SAMAccountname"

project_creation_restriction.description: This attribute restricts what users have the permission to create project.  It can be "everyone" or "adminonly".

read_only.description: 'docker push' is prohibited by Harbor if you set it to true.

parameter.description: The parameters of the policy, the values are dependant on the type of the policy.

daily_time.description: The offest in seconds of UTC 0 o'clock, only valid when the policy type is "daily"

type.description: The type of scan all policy, currently the valid values are "none" and "daily"

self_registration.description: Whether the Harbor instance supports self-registration.  If it's set to false, admin need to add user to the instance.

token_expiration.description: The expiration time of the token for internal Registry, in minutes.

verify_remote_cert.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access a remote Harbor instance for replication.

Dependency.description: Another chart the chart depends on

name.description: The name of the chart denpendency

version.description: The version of the chart dependency

created.description: The build time of the image.

docker_version.description: The version of docker which builds the image.

scan_overview.description: The overview of the scan result.  This is an optional property.

components.description: The components overview of the image.

summary.description: List of number of components of different severities.

total.description: Total number of the components in this image.

details_key.description: The top layer name of this image in Clair, this is for calling Clair API to get the vulnerability list of this image.

job_id.description: The ID of the job on jobservice to scan the image.

scan_status.description: The status of the scan job, it can be "pendnig", "running", "finished", "error".

signature.description: The signature of image, defined by RepoSignature. If it is null, the image is unsigned.

prov_file.description: The URL of the provance file

signed.description: A flag to indicate if the chart is signed

endtime.description: the end time of gc job.

starttime.description: the start time of gc job.

offtime.description: The time offset with the UTC 00:00 in seconds.

type.description: The schedule type. The valid values are dailyï¼Œ weekly and None. 'None' means to cancel the schedule.

weekday.description: Optional, only used when the type is weekly. The valid values are 1-7.

admiral_endpoint.description: The url of the endpoint of admiral instance.

auth_mode.description: The auth mode of current Harbor instance.

clair_vulnerability_status.description: The status of vulnerability data of Clair.

details.description: Detail timestamp of different namespace.  This is introduced to handle the case when some updaters are executed successfully and some not.

overall_last_update.description: The UTC timestamp in milliseconds of last successful update for Clair vulnerability data, when all the updaters are successfully executed.

has_ca_root.description: Indicate whether there is a ca root cert file ready for download in the file system.

next_scan_all.description: The UTC time in milliseconds, after which user can call scanAll API to scan all images.

project_creation_restriction.description: Indicate who can create projects, it could be 'adminonly' or 'everyone'.

self_registration.description: Indicate whether the Harbor instance enable user to register himself.

with_admiral.description: If the Harbor instance is deployed with Admiral.

with_clair.description: If the Harbor instance is deployed with nested clair.

with_notary.description: If the Harbor instance is deployed with nested notary.

editable.description: The configure item can be updated or not

value.description: The integer value of current config item

creation_time.description: The creation time of the job.

policy_id.description: The ID of the policy that triggered this job.

repository.description: The repository handled by the job.

update_time.description: The update time of the job.

deleted.description: The label is deleted or not.

project_id.description: The project ID if the label is a project label.

scope.description: The scope of label, g for global labels and p for project labels.

ldap_base_dn.description: The base dn of ldap service.

ldap_connection_timeout.description: The connect timeout of ldap service(second).

ldap_filter.description: The serach filter of ldap service.

ldap_scope.description: The serach scope of ldap service.

ldap_search_dn.description: The search dn of ldap service.

ldap_search_password.description: The search password of ldap service.

ldap_uid.description: The serach uid from ldap service attributes.
the uid can't add to system.

ldap_email.description: system will try to guess the user email address form "mail" or "email" attribute.

ldap_realname.description: system will try to guess the user realname form "uid" or "cn" attribute.

ldap_username.description: search ldap user name based on ldapconf.

new_password.description: New password for marking as to be updated.

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

chart_count.description: The total number of charts under this project.

creation_time.description: The creation time of the project.

current_user_role_id.description: The role ID of the current user who triggered the API (for UI)

deleted.description: A deletion mark of the project.

owner_id.description: The owner ID of the project always means the creator of the project.

owner_name.description: The owner name of the project.

repo_count.description: The number of the repositories under this project.

togglable.description: Correspond to the UI about whether the project's publicity is  updatable (for UI)

update_time.description: The update time of the project.

role_id.description: The role id 1 for projectAdmin, 2 for developer, 3 for guest

entity_id.description: the id of entity, if the member is an user, it is user_id in user table. if the member is an user group, it is the user group's ID in user_group table.

entity_name.description: the name of the group member.

entity_type.description: the entity's type, u for user entity, g for group entity.

automatically_scan_images_on_push.description: Whether scan images automatically when pushing. The valid values are "true", "false".

enable_content_trust.description: Whether content trust is enabled or not. If it is enabled, user cann't pull unsigned images from this project. The valid values are "true", "false".

prevent_vulnerable_images_from_running.description: Whether prevent the vulnerable images from running. The valid values are "true", "false".

prevent_vulnerable_images_from_running_s.description: If the vulnerability is high than severity defined here, the images cann't be pulled. The valid values are "negligible", "low", "medium", "high", "critical".

public.description: The public status of the project. The valid values are "true", "false".

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

kind.description: The replication policy filter kind. The valid values are project, repository and tag.

metadata.description: This map object is the replication policy filter metadata.

pattern.description: Depraceted, use value instead. The replication policy filter pattern.

value.description: The value of replication policy filter. When creating repository and tag filter, filling it with the pattern as string. When creating label filter, filling it with label ID as integer.

creation_time.description: The create time of the policy.

error_job_count.description: The error job count number for the policy.

projects.description: The project list that the policy applys to.

replicate_deletion.description: Whether to replicate the deletion operation.

replicate_existing_image_now.description: Whether to replicate the existing images now.

update_time.description: The update time of the policy.

creation_time.description: The create time of the policy.

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

update_time.description: The update time of the policy.

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

kind.description: The replication policy trigger kind. The valid values are manual, immediate and schedule.

hashes.description: The JSON object of the hash of the image.

role_code.description: Description of permissions for the role.

roles.description: Role ID for updating project role member.

username.description: Username relevant to a project role member.

role_id.description: The role id 1 for projectAdmin, 2 for developer, 3 for guest

offtime.description: The time offset with the UTC 00:00 in seconds.

type.description: The schedule type. The valid values are daily and weekly.

weekday.description: Optional, only used when the type is weedly. The valid values are 1-7.

chart.description: Search results of the charts that macthed the filter keywords.

project.description: Search results of the projects that matched the filter keywords.

repository.description: Search results of the repositories that matched the filter keywords.

project_id.description: The ID of the project that the repository belongs to

project_name.description: The name of the project that the repository belongs to

project_public.description: The flag to indicate the publicity of the project that the repository belongs to (1 is public, 0 is not)

pull_count.description: The count how many times the repository is pulled

tags_count.description: The count of tags in the repository

name.description: The chart name with repo name

SecurityReport.description: The security information of the chart

private_project_count.description: The count of the private projects which the user is a member of.

private_repo_count.description: The count of the private repositories belonging to the projects which the user is a member of.

public_project_count.description: The count of the public projects.

public_repo_count.description: The count of the public repositories belonging to the public projects which the user is a member of.

total_project_count.description: The count of the total projects, only be seen when the is admin.

total_repo_count.description: The count of the total repositories, only be seen when the user is admin.

editable.description: The configure item can be updated or not

value.description: The string value of current config item

status.description: The status of jobs. The only valid value is stop for now.

group_name.description: The name of the user group

group_type.description: The group type, 1 for LDAP group.

id.description: The ID of the user group

ldap_group_dn.description: The DN of the LDAP group if group type is 1 (LDAP group).

last_update.description: The UTC timestamp in miliseconds of last successful update for vulnerability data.

fixedVersion.description: The version which the vulnerability is fixed, this is an optional property.

id.description: ID of the vulnerability, normally it is the CVE ID

package.description: The packge that introduces the vulnerability.

UnsupportedMediaType.description: The Media Type of the request is not supported, it has to be "application/json"
